alert.note: Alert for Collier (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued September 27 at 6:31PM EDT until September 27 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Tornado Warning for... South central Collier County in southwestern Florida... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 630 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Everglades City, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Chokoloskee, Everglades City, Plantation Island, Carnestown and Copeland. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
